name: Star of the Sefrim
description:
The Star of the Sefrim is awarded to those who go above and beyond the call of duty in service to the Empire, particularly those whose actions place them into mortal danger. While capsuleers rarely risk permanent death, the Empire sometimes acknowledges the loss of body regardless.

“From on high, they came with wisdom and mercy. They delivered greatness to the people. But when provoked, their wroth was immutable.”- The Scriptures, Book of Missions, 45:3
